sentences.english: If it is an umbrella, memory is the most clear coagulation red umbrella.
sentences.chinese: 倘若是打傘，記憶最深的是清凝的紅傘。

sentences.english: They believe that the absence of the remaining mean that the coming year would be poverty.
sentences.chinese: 他們以爲，倘若沒不足下的酒肉，來年便會貧窶。

sentences.english: If so, you've got a powder keg.
sentences.chinese: 倘若果真如此，這個人就像一個正在形成的火藥桶。

sentences.english: If I am to be judged by those who come after me, let me be judged by the truth.
sentences.chinese: 倘若後人要評判我，我唯願他們據實以判。

sentences.english: It would be a pity for Japan if the Liberal Democrats gave up without a fight, however.
sentences.chinese: 倘若自民黨不戰而敗，對日本而言，實屬憾事。

sentences.english: Please indicate that if you wish to accept a Classic Card if you are not offered a Platinum Card.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你的白金卡申請未被接納，是否願意接受普通卡？

sentences.english: If you would like to know more about my ability, I can be available for an interview at any time convenient to you.
sentences.chinese: 倘若您願意接見本人以瞭解我的能力，我將隨時侯教。

sentences.english: Had the board brought in a new face too early, it might have attracted mud.
sentences.chinese: 倘若董事會提早推出一張新面孔，可能會招致非議。

sentences.english: We will let you operate on the new machine on condition that you follow the operating rules.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你遵守操作規程，我們就讓你開這臺新機器。

sentences.english: When out of love, the most pleasant spring will lose its luster.
sentences.chinese: 倘若失戀，多好的春天，也會黯然無光。

sentences.english: Really, if the eastern temple livings to change, I can no defend you.
sentences.chinese: 的確，倘若東宮生變，我無法護你。

sentences.english: And in the event that you do fall ill, stock up on herbal remedies like ginseng and black elderberry.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你生病了，你可以使用人蔘和黑接骨木等中草藥。

sentences.english: Should the Lord come back today to settle accounts with me, what would be His comments for me?
sentences.chinese: 倘若主今天回來要我交帳，我得到的評價會是什麼？

sentences.english: Make this your case: no jury would convict.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你拿這個做辯護詞，陪審團肯定不會定罪的。

sentences.english: If in this stage of life, that is bitter that lives.
sentences.chinese: 倘若留在人生的這一階段，那就苦了這條命了。

sentences.english: If you try to change the name of the school you will run up against a lot of opposition.
sentences.chinese: 倘若你要更換學校的名稱，你會遭到多人的反對。

definition: to be bound to/to be sure to
